Glossary¶

shortcode

The shortcode of an Instagram post. If viewing the url of the post, it is the string after the “/p/”.

For example: “https://www.instagram.com/p/B8fB0cAp5Lv/” –> “B8fB0cAp5Lv”

cloudburst
